name: ShareJesusTestimony
0:
”Alexa, open Share Jesus Testimony”
”Alexa, ask Share Jesus Testimony for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Share Jesus Testimony”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: share jesus testimony
des:
Arc Gospel Media is an internet based Bible sharing society which works to spread the teachings of the word of Jesus Christ to the people through internet. This is the kind of gospel that Jesus Christ gave 2000 years ago in this world. The dying, resurrection, and ascension of Jesus Christ was a marvelous event, and this event is alive today, 2000 years later and will continue to be so because Jesus Christ is alive. 
The purpose of Arc Gospel Media is to bring God's plan of this eternal life to every person so that he may know and accept it as his Savior and enter the kingdom of eternal life. We spread the teachings of the Bible through digital e-books,audio, live video, and animated / live short films, through witnessing to the gospel.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
